channel.title: Request-A-TuT! Post a TuT You Want Made Here!
channel.description:
Im bored atm I want you People to request TuTs!!! O M G and I will Make you tuts
I will do them in order as they are Requested. If you want a tut you [u]must[/u] use this layout: [code] [b]Name:[/b] (Name of tut) [b]Discription:[/b] (Very Detailed Discription.)[/code]
[u]If you dont use that your request will be fully disregarded.[/u]
Current TuT Im Working On: - None
Pending TuTs: - None
Complete TuTs: - None
~Nirvana~

item.title: Request-A-TuT! Post a TuT You Want Made Here!
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

EALclan:

i was wondering if some one could help me (make a tut to stop pk farming) make it to if you kill some one with the same ip you dont get the points.

This thread is 3 years old…

Read full topic

item.title: Request-A-TuT! Post a TuT You Want Made Here!
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“Nintendo_G, post:6, topic:84205”]Name: Making existing commands mod admin and owner only
Discription:First of all I would like to make and existing command mod admin and owner only.

Name: Making an object admin and owner only
Discription:I would like to make it where perfect rings are admin and owner only so like if we die and drop it other people can’t even see them or something.[/quote]

lets say a food command that gives 1shark is for normal players

if(command.startsWith("food")) { addItem(shark ID, 1); }

now to make that owners owner only, add && playerRights == 3) { to the if(command.startsWith(“food”)) {
so this is what it would look like

if(command.startsWith("food") && playerRights == 3) { addItem(Shark ID, 1); }

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @nappymonster nappymonster
item.description:
@nappymonster wrote:

Name:Editing characters in Testscape
Description:In test scape, whenever you edit one of the characters txt files, it reverts back to what it was before you edited it when you log on. E.G If i edit my stats or Player-rights, it has no effect whatsoever, and when i reload the txt file, it is back to how it was before :mad:

Everyone, please do not request tutorials that are already posted in the Tutorials Section: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?board=51.0 For example “Full Mining” Requested by “zez1ma boy” is posted in that section. Just the owner of this topic is very busy and dont make her create a tutorial that was already created, then she would be accused of leaching. And that is very bad!

Thank you,
Rich Dude99

item.title: Request-A-TuT! Post a TuT You Want Made Here!
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Was Zenzie ubanned? I hope not.

Anyway, keep up the good work I guess. You’re helping all the dumb people that don’t know there’s a tutorial list and a tutorial section.

If I were a Moderator, half of the “tutorials” would be moved here, because they aren’t really tutorials.

[quote=“bigshot154, post:40, topic:84205”]Name: full range
Discription: hi i would like a full range tut please. [pimpscape based][/quote]

Dell made that, you should go into the tutorial list and then look for Dell. The names are in alphabetical order, so it shouldn’t be too tough.

Nzscape:

every now again my pimpscape based server crashes saying everyones still online and not letting anyone in anyway i can fix this error?

You’d have to be a good coder to fix this, and also have a good computer. This basically means, people are lagging you out by either massing or doing something deliberatly to shut the server down, such as DDoS’ing, attacking unattackable NPC’s, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Request-A-TuT! Post a TuT You Want Made Here!
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

if(playerRights < 1)
{		
outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
outStream.writeByteC(5); // command slot (does it matter which one?)
outStream.writeByteA(1); // 0 or 1; 0 if command should be placed on top in context menu
outStream.writeString("@blu@Stats");
outStream.endFrameVarSize();
} else {		
outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
outStream.writeByteC(5); // command slot (does it matter which one?)
outStream.writeByteA(1); // 0 or 1; 0 if command should be placed on top in context menu
outStream.writeString("@whi@Walk here");
outStream.endFrameVarSize();
}

um doesnt that just make it so neone with 1+ rights doesnt have that option at all? wouldnt just removing the playerrights from the defualt one accomplish what the guy wanted? meh… im a critic, dont hate you, hate everyone^^

Read full topic
item.source: Request-A-TuT! Post a TuT You Want Made Here!

item.title: Request-A-TuT! Post a TuT You Want Made Here!
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

[quote=“mitchtheblonde, post:21, topic:84205”]Name: Fixing the Right click+stat kick thing on testscape.
Discription: When mods/admins/creators on my server do right click and click on stats, it kicks the player. I would like to make it so it shows there stats.[/quote]

under

int deathcount1 = p2.deathcount;

add

sendQuest("@dre@Stats", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest(p2.playerName+" @dre@Stats", 8145); sendQuest("@blu@Pk Points: @yel@"+pkpoints1, 8148); sendQuest("@blu@Kills: @yel@"+killcount1, 8149); sendQuest("@blu@Deaths: @yel@"+deathcount1, 8150); sendQuest("@dbl@@dbl@Attack Level is:" +Attacklvl, 8151); sendQuest("@dbl@@dbl@Strength Level is:"+Strengthlvl, 8152); sendQuest("@dbl@@dbl@Defence Level is:"+Defencelvl, 8153); sendQuest("@dbl@@dbl@Hitpoints Level is:"+Hitpointslvl, 8154); sendQuest("@dbl@@dbl@Prayer Level is:"+Prayerlvl, 8155); sendQuest("@dbl@@dbl@Magic Level is:"+Magiclvl, 8156); sendQuest("@dbl@@dbl@Range Level is:"+Rangelvl, 8157); sendQuest("@dbl@@dbl@Runecraft Level is:"+Runecraftlvl, 8158); sendQuest("@dbl@@dbl@Herblore Level is:"+Herblorelvl, 8159); sendQuest("@dbl@@dbl@Theiving Level is:"+Theivinglvl, 8160); sendQuest("@dbl@@dbl@Agility Level is:"+Agilitylvl, 8161); sendQuest("@dbl@@dbl@Crafting Level is:"+Craftinglvl, 8162); sendQuest("@dbl@@dbl@Fletching Level is:"+Fletchinglvl, 8163); sendQuest("@dbl@@dbl@Slayer Level is:"+Slayerlvl, 8164); sendQuest("@dbl@@dbl@Mining Level is:"+Mininglvl, 8165); sendQuest("@dbl@@dbl@Smithing Level is:"+Smithinglvl, 8166); sendQuest("@dbl@@dbl@Fishing Level is:"+Fishinglvl, 8167); sendQuest("@dbl@@dbl@Cooking Level is:"+Cookinglvl, 8168); sendQuest("@dbl@@dbl@Firemaking Level is:"+Firemakinglvl, 8169); sendQuest("@dbl@@dbl@Woodcutting Level is:"+Woodcuttinglvl, 8170); sendQuest("@dbl@@dbl@Farming Level is:"+Farminglvl, 8171); sendQuest("@dbl@@dbl@Summoning Level is:"+Summonlvl, 8171); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); } }

search something like this outStream.writeString("@blu@Stats");

u’ll see

if(playerRights == 0) { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(5); // command slot (does it matter which one?) outStream.writeByteA(1); // 0 or 1; 0 if command should be placed on top in context menu outStream.writeString("@blu@Stats"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); } else if(playerRights > 0) { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(5); // command slot (does it matter which one?) outStream.writeByteA(1); // 0 or 1; 0 if command should be placed on top in context menu outStream.writeString("@bla@Kick"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); }

replace those 2 with

if(playerRights < 0) { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(5); // command slot (does it matter which one?) outStream.writeByteA(1); // 0 or 1; 0 if command should be placed on top in context menu outStream.writeString("@blu@Stats"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); } else { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(5); // command slot (does it matter which one?) outStream.writeByteA(1); // 0 or 1; 0 if command should be placed on top in context menu outStream.writeString("@whi@Walk here"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); }

Tell me if you get any errors =D

Read full topic
